HypeRIMU

HypeRIMU is a R-package for reading sensor data from the Android app HyperIMU.

Installation and usage

if(!require("devtools"))
  install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohannesFriedrich/HypeRIMU@master")

Related projects

  • HIMUServer
  • HyperIMU Android
  • Android API

To Do
